summary:
So sad news for the Linux side of readers of this blog.  I decided to switch my Home Lab environment OS back to Windows 11. 
There were a few reasons for this change but, mainly the fact of having to hoop jump to get my Nvidia graphics card drivers to work plus the hoop jumping to get some of the games I play to work pushed me back to Windows...

summary:
When pairing with my friend Emily, we had a choice of what to implement in her project:
start a new feature, or add a command line argument parser. 
We opted for the latter, because it had to happen eventually and it was more well bounded. 
It ended up having a lot of depth...
